titleStmt.title: The victim, or, Achilles and Iphigenia in Aulis a tragedy. As it was acted at the Theatre-Royal, in Drury-Lane / written by Mr. Boyer.
titleStmt.author: Boyer, Abel, 1667-1729.
Racine, Jean, 1639-1699. Iphigénie.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition. To which is added, an advertisement about the late irregular reviving of this tragedy; with a copy of verses to the plagiary.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Knapton; William Taylor; J. Baker; and W. Lewis,

notesStmt.note: Translation and adaptation of: Iphigénie / Racine.
Dedicatory pages and discussion of the tragedy [11 p.] precede t.p.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
